001package gbw.melange.common.shading.postprocess;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
004import gbw.melange.common.shading.IManagedShader;
005
006/**
007 * A specific style of shader which has at least 1 input texture
008 */
009public interface IPostProcessShader extends IManagedShader<IPostProcessShader> {
010    void setInputTexture(Texture texture);
011    Texture getTexture();
012}
